item.title: Get started
item.description: Get started ​​ Before you begin Before you start this tutorial, make sure you have: Completed the prerequisites. Reviewed your rate limiting rules to make sure they allow at least one request every 20 seconds (required for automatic page refreshes). ​​ Step 1 — Plan out your waiting room Before you create your waiting room, think about how you want it to appear and operate. ​​ Location Which page will you cover with a waiting room?

item.title: Plans
item.description: Features by plan typeThe features available for a waiting room depend on your plan type. You can only have one plan per zone. Free Pro Business Enterprise Availability No No Yes Yes Number of rooms 0 0 1 Custom Customized templates No No No Paid add-on Disable session renewal No No No Paid add-on JSON-friendly response No No No Paid add-on Queueing methods No No First In First Out (FIFO) First In First Out (FIFO)With add-onAll options Waiting Room rules No No No Paid add-on Scheduled events No No No Paid add-on ​​ How do I get started?
